mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_id AS lectureId, l.member_id AS memberId, l.title, l.profile, l.description, l.description_pic AS descriptionPic, l.category, l.price, l.status, l.link, l.likes, l.limit_student AS limitStudent, l.deadline_time AS deadlineTime, l.lectures_date AS lecturesDate, l.start_date AS startDate, l.end_date AS endDate, l.deleted, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tag_name ORDER BY t.tag_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS tags, (SELECT COUNT(a.member_id) FROM attends a WHERE a.lecture_id = l.lecture_id) AS enrolledStudents, (l.limit_student - (SELECT COUNT(a.member_id) FROM attends a WHERE a.lecture_id = l.lecture_id)) AS leftSpace FROM lectures l LEFT JOIN lectures_tags lt ON l.lecture_id = lt.lecture_id LEFT JOIN tags t ON lt.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE l.deleted = 0 GROUP BY l.lecture_id ORDER BY l.lectures_date DESC;
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM likes WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND lecture_id = #{lectureId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE lectures SET likes = likes + IF( #{exist} , -1 , +1 ) WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND lecture_id = #{lectureId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likes (member_id, lecture_id, like_status) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{lectureId}, true)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND lecture_id = #{lectureId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture_files (lecture_id, member_id, file_url) VALUES (#{lectureId}, #{memberId}, #{fileUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id FROM members WHERE id = #{memberId}

SELECT l.lecture_id AS lectureId, l.member_id AS memberId, l.title, l.profile, l.description, l.description_pic AS descriptionPic, l.category, l.price, l.status, l.link, l.likes, l.limit_student AS limitStudent, l.deadline_time AS deadlineTime, l.lectures_date AS lecturesDate, l.start_date AS startDate, l.end_date AS endDate, l.deleted, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tag_name ORDER BY t.tag_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS tags, (SELECT COUNT(a.member_id) FROM attends a WHERE a.lecture_id = l.lecture_id) AS enrolledStudents, (l.limit_student - (SELECT COUNT(a.member_id) FROM attends a WHERE a.lecture_id = l.lecture_id)) AS leftSpace FROM lectures l LEFT JOIN lectures_tags lt ON l.lecture_id = lt.lecture_id LEFT JOIN tags t ON lt.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE l.deleted = 0 AND l.lecture_id = #{lectureId} GROUP BY l.lecture_id ORDER BY l.lectures_date DESC;
SELECT file_url as fileUrl FROM lecture_files WHERE lecture_id = #{lectureId}
SELECT tag_id FROM lectures_tags WHERE lecture_id = #{lectureId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attends ( member_id , lecture_id ) VALUES ( #{ memberId } , #{ lectureId } )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM attends WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND lecture_id = #{lectureId}

SELECT m.email, GROUP_CONCAT( ll.title, ' (', DATE_FORMAT(ll.start_time, '%H:%i'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(ll.end_time, '%H:%i'), ')' SEPARATOR '\n' ) AS schedule FROM lecture_lists ll JOIN lectures l ON ll.lecture_id = l.lecture_id JOIN members m ON ll.member_id = m.member_id WHERE DATE(ll.start_time) = CURDATE() GROUP BY m.email;

SELECT m.email, l.title AS title, DATE_FORMAT(ll.start_time, '%Y년 %c월 %e일 %p %l시 %i분') AS startTime, l.link AS link FROM attends a JOIN members m ON a.member_id = m.member_id JOIN lectures l ON a.lecture_id = l.lecture_id JOIN lecture_lists ll ON l.lecture_id = ll.lecture_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') = DATE_FORMAT(ll.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i');
